functions.name: search
functions.desc: Search Wikipedia for an article with the given title, and get its content. If no such article is found, return similar article names.

msg.content: Which banks are the top five largest banks in the world by market capitalization and what are their website link addresses?
Which banks are the top five largest banks in the world by market capitalization and what are their website link addresses?

function.name: search
function.arguments: {"query": "List of largest banks in the world by market capitalization"}

function.name: search
function.arguments: {"query": "List of largest banks in the world by market capitalization 2023"}

function.name: search
function.arguments: {"query": "List of largest banks in the world by market capitalization"}

function.arguments: {"query": "List of largest banks in the world by market capitalization 2023"}

msg.content:
<document>
<title>List of largest banks</title>
<content>
The following are lists of the largest banks in the world, as measured by market capitalization and total assets.




## By market capitalization[edit]


The list is based on Forbes.com's ranking as of August 2023 based on an analysis of the bank's operations, financial performance, and overall impact on the global economy.[1]



![](image)
JPMorgan Chase, the largest bank in the world by market capitalization



| Rank
 | Bank name
 | Market cap(US$ billion)
 |
| --- | --- | --- |
| 1
 | ![United States](image) JPMorgan Chase | 419.25
 |
| 2
 | ![United States](image) Bank of America | 231.52
 |
| 3
 | ![China](image) Industrial and Commercial Bank of China | 194.56
 |
| 4
 | ![China](image) Agricultural Bank of China | 160.68
 |
| 5
 | ![India](image) HDFC Bank | 157.91
 |
| 6
 | ![United States](image) Wells Fargo | 155.87
 |
| 7
 | ![United Kingdom](image) HSBC Holdings PLC | 148.90
 |
| 8
 | ![United States](image) Morgan Stanley | 140.83
 |
| 9
 | ![China](image) China Construction Bank | 139.82
 |
| 10
 | ![China](image) Bank of China | 136.81
 |


## By total assets[edit]


![](image)
Industrial and Commercial Bank of China, the largest bank in the world by total assets

The list is based on the April 2023 S&P Global Market Intelligence report of the 100 largest banks in the world. The ranking was based upon assets as reported and was not adjusted for different accounting treatments.[2] Another publication which has the goal to compile a yearly list of the world largest banks is The Banker Magazine. Every year in their July number a list of the World 1000 Largest Banks is published.[3] The financial data published by the July yearly issue of The Banker are much more extensive compared to the S&P Top 100 banks, but it's not a publication intended for the general public.


Accounting treatment affects the assets reported: for example, the United States uses US GAAP (as opposed to IFRS), which only reports the net derivative position in most cases, leading to US banks having fewer derivative assets than comparable non-US banks.[4] If JPMorgan Chase reported under the IFRS, it would be ranked 2nd on the list as of 2023[update], rather than 5th.[2]





| Rank
 | Bank name
 | Total assets(2022)(US$ billion)
 |
| --- | --- | --- |
| 1
 | ![China](image) Industrial and Commercial Bank of China Limited | 5,742.86
 |
| 2

## See also[edit]


* List of systemically important banks
* List of largest banks in the Americas
* List of largest banks in North America
* List of largest banks in Latin America
* List of largest banks in the United States
* List of banks in Europe
* List of banks in Asia
* List of largest banks in Southeast Asia
* List of banks in Oceania
* List of banks in Africa


## References[edit]


* ![icon](image)Banks portal


1. **^** "The 10 largest banks in the world in 2023". Forbes India. 21 August 2023.
2. ^ ***a*** ***b*** ***c*** Khan, Zia; Terris, Harry; Meggeson, Ben (26 April 2023). "The world's 100 largest banks, 2023". *spglobal.com*. S&P Global Market Intelligence. Retrieved 16 June 2023.
3. **^** Banker, The. "Top 1000". *www.thebanker.com*. Retrieved 26 August 2023.
4. **^** "World's 100 Biggest Banks: China's ICBC #1". *Forbes*. 12 February 2014.

</content>

## By market capitalization[edit]


The list is based on Forbes.com's ranking as of August 2023 based on an analysis of the bank's operations, financial performance, and overall impact on the global economy.[1]

JPMorgan Chase, the largest bank in the world by market capitalization

Accounting treatment affects the assets reported: for example, the United States uses US GAAP (as opposed to IFRS), which only reports the net derivative position in most cases, leading to US banks having fewer derivative assets than comparable non-US banks.[4] If JPMorgan Chase reported under the IFRS, it would be ranked 2nd on the list as of 2023[update], rather than 5th.[2]

* List of banks in Asia
* List of largest banks in Southeast Asia
* List of banks in Oceania
* List of banks in Africa


## References[edit]


* ![icon](image)Banks portal


1. **^** "The 10 largest banks in the world in 2023". Forbes India. 21 August 2023.
2. ^ ***a*** ***b*** ***c*** Khan, Zia; Terris, Harry; Meggeson, Ben (26 April 2023). "The world's 100 largest banks, 2023". *spglobal.com*. S&P Global Market Intelligence. Retrieved 16 June 2023.
3. **^** Banker, The. "Top 1000". *www.thebanker.com*. Retrieved 26 August 2023.
4. **^** "World's 100 Biggest Banks: China's ICBC #1". *Forbes*. 12 February 2014.

</content>
</document>

msg.content:
Based on the latest data from Forbes as of August 2023, the top five largest banks in the world by market capitalization are:

1. **JPMorgan Chase**
   - Market Cap: $419.25 billion
   - Website: [JPMorgan Chase](https://www.jpmorganchase.com)

2. **Bank of America**
   - Market Cap: $231.52 billion
   - Website: [Bank of America](https://www.bankofamerica.com)

3. **Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (ICBC)**
   - Market Cap: $194.56 billion
   - Website: [ICBC](http://www.icbc.com.cn)

4. **Agricultural Bank of China**
   - Market Cap: $160.68 billion
   - Website: [Agricultural Bank of China](http://www.abchina.com)

5. **HDFC Bank**
   - Market Cap: $157.91 billion
   - Website: [HDFC Bank](https://www.hdfcbank.com)

These banks are ranked based on their market capitalization, reflecting their value in the global financial market.
